name: Zlimes
description:
In short,
Zlimes is a game where you try to get the highest possible score by surviving the endless waves of slimes. The game contains various types of waves including a boss wave. In addition, the game contains power-ups, different types of weapons with different upgrades and different types of enemies. 

For the Easter egg of this game,
By completing the Easter egg of this game you unlock the ability to upgrade your weapons. Almost every weapon in the game has 4 upgrades, every upgrade gives the gun a new skin and makes it stronger.

Journey,
I started making this game on the 12th of April 2018. Although I already thought of the game's game concept much earlier. The idea for the game arose from a love for call of duty zombies. When I started with the first variant I was not satisfied with the quality, so I put the project down. Half a year later when I was drawing some sprites, I started to get so much inspiration that I restarted the software and went on with the concept but then with a whole new style. That's how Zlimes was born. A game where I put a lot of time and effort into but all this effort was well worth it.

Movement,
Use the W, A, S, and D keys to move around.
Use the Mouse to aim.
Click the Left Mouse Button to shoot or stab.
Use the E or Q key to interact.
